\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage[latin1]{inputenc}

\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usepgfplotslibrary{groupplots}

\usepackage{caption,subcaption}  %for tables andfigures
\usetikzlibrary{matrix,positioning}
\renewcommand\thesubfigure{(\alph{subfigure})}
\usetikzlibrary{arrows.meta}
\usepackage{mathptmx}

% pgfplots options
\pgfplotsset{compat=newest}
\pgfplotsset{
    /pgfplots/layers/MyLayer/.define layer set={
        axis background,axis grid,main,axis ticks,axis lines,axis tick labels,
        axis descriptions,axis foreground
    }{/pgfplots/layers/standard},
}

\pgfplotsset{
    default_axis_style/.style={
        % Size figure
        height=6cm,
        width=8cm,
        % Axis lines
        axis lines = left,
        axis line style={-{Stealth[length=2mm]}},
        % Grid
        grid style={line width=0.1pt, draw=gray!60, dashed},
        xmajorgrids,
        ymajorgrids,
        xminorgrids,
        yminorgrids,
        % Ticks style
        ticklabel style = {font=\scriptsize},
        tick align = center,
        tick style = {draw=black},
        label style={font=\footnotesize},
        %Legend
        legend style={
            cells={anchor=west, align={left}},
            %draw=none,
            %fill=none,
            font=\footnotesize,
            legend pos= north east,
        },
        % Position elements relatively to each other
        %set layers=MyLayer
    },
    default_trace_style/.style={
        line width=1pt,
        solid,
        mark=*,
    },
}

\pgfkeys{/pgf/number format/.cd,1000 sep={}}

% Fix imports
\usepackage{import}
\makeatletter
\def\relativepath{\import@path}
\makeatother
